name: Edgar Temkin
description:
I'm Edgar Temkin, a Game Designer & Product Manager with a B.Sc. in Game Design & Development from Tiltan School of Design & Visual Communication. With a strong background in game design, project management, and cross-team collaboration, I specialize in creating engaging mechanics and immersive player experiences.
Throughout my career, I've worked on a variety of projects, leading game development, balancing mechanics, and ensuring smooth production using Agile methodologies. I thrive on designing innovative gameplay systems, optimizing user experience, and bringing creative ideas to life.
Passionate about games that challenge and entertain, Iâ€™m always exploring new ways to push boundaries and craft compelling experiences that resonate with players.
